message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to my original asking price. How about $13,750?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,500?
